channel.title: Sky on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sky on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dominic West, Sienna Miller to Lead Sky and HBO Legal Thriller ‘War’ From ‘Hijack’ Creator George Kay
item.description: Set in the elite world of London law, the show gets a two-season commitment, with West starring as tech titan Morgan Henderson and Miller as his estranged wife, international film star Carla Duval.

item.title: Dominic West, Sienna Miller to Lead Sky and HBO Legal Thriller ‘War’ From ‘Hijack’ Creator George Kay
item.description: Set in the elite world of London law, the show gets a two-season commitment, with West starring as tech titan Morgan Henderson and Miller as his estranged wife, international film star Carla Duval.

item.title: Sky and ITV Renew Long-Standing Content Deal
item.description: ITV’s biggest shows, such as ‘Love Island’ and ‘Trigger Point,’ will remain available across all Sky TV platforms in Britain.

item.title: Sky and ITV Renew Long-Standing Content Deal
item.description: ITV’s biggest shows, such as ‘Love Island’ and ‘Trigger Point,’ will remain available across all Sky TV platforms in Britain.
